description: Dashboard to monitor multiple Teku instances.

panels.description: Number of local validators
panels.title: Local Validators

panels.description: Number of blocks published
panels.title: Published Blocks

panels.description: Number of attestations published
panels.title: Published Attestations

panels.description: Number of aggregates published
panels.title: Published Aggregates

panels.description: Number of sync committee messages published.
panels.title: Published Sync Committee Messages

panels.description: Total number of active validators in the network.
panels.title: Total Validators

panels.description: Percentage of attestations in each epoch with the correct head root, correct target root and that were successfully included in blocks.
panels.title: Attestation Performance

panels.description: Number of slots between when an attestation is created to when it is included in a block. The minimum possible inclusion distance is 1.
panels.title: Attestation Inclusion Distance (slots)

panels.description: Percentage of blocks produced in each epoch that were successfully included in the canonical chain.
panels.title: Included Blocks

panels.description: Percentage of attestations in each epoch with the correct head root, correct target root and that were successfully included in blocks.
panels.title: Attestation Inclusion Detail

panels.description: Percentage of attestations in each epoch with the correct head root, correct target root and that were successfully included in blocks.
panels.title: Correct Head Detail

panels.description: Current slot according to system time
panels.title: Current slot

panels.description: Slot of the latest imported block
panels.title: Head slot

panels.description: Current justified epoch
panels.title: Justified Epoch

panels.description: Current finalized epoch
panels.title: Finalized Epoch

panels.description: Total number of peers connected to the selected nodes.
panels.title: Peer Count

panels.description: The current epoch according to system time
panels.title: Current Epoch

panels.description: Number of slots the head block is behind.

targets.expr: max without (alerting, job, instance, client) (beacon_slot{instance=~"$system"} - beacon_head_slot{instance=~"$system"})

panels.title: Slots Behind

panels.description: Number of epochs that justification has been delayed.
panels.title: Justification Delay (epochs)

panels.description: Number of epochs that finalisation has been delayed.
panels.title: Finalisation Delay (epochs)

panels.description: Percentage of validators which voted for the correct target in the previous epoch.
panels.title: Network Participation Rate

panels.description: Number of slots the head block is behind the current slot. Empty slots may mean the head block trails by a few slots.
panels.title: Trailing Distance

panels.description: Overall participation rate in the chain. The Correct Validators must be above 2/3rd for the chain to finalize.
panels.title: Participation Rate

panels.description: Breakdown of client software run by peers. Note that software cannot always be determined for peers and percentage of peers isn't indicative of number of validators using that software.
panels.title: Peer Client Software

panels.description: Total number of prepared proposers
panels.title: Prepared Proposers

panels.description: Total number of registered validators willing to produce blocks using builder infrastructure
panels.title: Registered Validators

targets.expr: sum by (fallback_reason) (increase(beacon_execution_payload_source{instance=~"$system", source="builder_local_el_fallback", fallback_reason!~""}[$__range])) or sum by (fallback_reason) (increase(beacon_execution_payload_source_total{instance=~"$system", source="builder_local_el_fallback", fallback_reason!~""}[$__range]))

panels.description: Builder Status API
Builder Validator Registration API
Builder Validator Registration API
Builder Status API
Builder Validator Registration API
Builder Validator Registration API
Builder Get Header API
Builder Get Payload API
Builder Get Header API
Builder Get Header API
Builder Get Payload API
Builder Get Payload API

targets.expr: sum by (interval) (increase(beacon_block_import_delay_counter{instance=~"$system", stage="arrival"}[$__range])) or sum by (interval) (increase(beacon_block_import_delay_counter_total{instance=~"$system", stage="arrival"}[$__range]))

panels.description: Block total processing time for successfully imported blocks

targets.expr: sum by (interval) (increase(beacon_block_import_delay_counter{instance=~"$system", stage="total_processing_time", result="success"}[$__range])) or sum by (interval) (increase(beacon_block_import_delay_counter_total{instance=~"$system", stage="total_processing_time", result="success"}[$__range]))

panels.title: Block Total Processing Time

panels.description: How long Teku waited for the execution layer to finish block processing
panels.title: Wait for Block Execution Layer Processing Time

panels.description: Block import failures grouped by failure reason

targets.expr: sum by (result) (increase(beacon_block_import_delay_counter{instance=~"$system", stage="total_processing_time", result!="success"}[$__range])) or sum by (result) (increase(beacon_block_import_delay_counter_total{instance=~"$system", stage="total_processing_time", result!="success"}[$__range]))

panels.title: Failed block import

panels.description: Percentage of old gen heap used.

targets.expr: (jvm_memory_pool_bytes_used{job="besu-node", pool="G1 Old Gen", instance=~"$system"} / jvm_memory_pool_bytes_max{job="besu-node", pool="G1 Old Gen", instance=~"$system"}) * 100  or (jvm_memory_pool_used_bytes{job="besu-node", pool="G1 Old Gen", instance=~"$system"} / jvm_memory_pool_max_bytes{job="besu-node", pool="G1 Old Gen", instance=~"$system"}) * 100

(jvm_memory_pool_bytes_used{job="teku-node", pool="G1 Old Gen", instance=~"$system"} / jvm_memory_pool_bytes_max{job="teku-node", pool="G1 Old Gen", instance=~"$system"}) * 100 or (jvm_memory_pool_used_bytes{job="teku-node", pool="G1 Old Gen", instance=~"$system"} / jvm_memory_pool_max_bytes{job="teku-node", pool="G1 Old Gen", instance=~"$system"}) * 100

panels.title: Old Gen Heap Usage
RPC Blocks and Blob sidecars Requested

panels.description: Tracks number of signatures waiting to be batch verified
panels.title: Batch Signature Verification Queue Size

panels.description: Shows the number of BlsToExecutionChange operations in the operation pool.
panels.title: BLS change queue

title: Teku - Detailed
